topics.body:
Fun fact about Frozen.
Did you know that in the original script, Elsa was suppose to be evil?

This was her original design.
!http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/088/f/6/evil_elsa_by_pilixlovegrucy-d7c3yyg.jpg!

She started with black hair but then turned white when she became evil.
